title: TelegraphBot
description: Bot informations are stored in database inside a telegraph_bots table and can be retrieved using DefStudio\Telegraph\Models\TelegaphBot model or using a custom Bot model.

title: Webhooks Overview
description: Telegram bots can interact with chats and users through a webhook system that enables it to be updated about chats changes, new commands and user interactions without continuously polling Telegram APIs for updates.
